name: Melbourne
overviewText:
Melbourne is a vibrant cultural hub that seamlessly blends art, food, and natural beauty.

Explore world-class museums like the National Gallery of Victoria (NGV) and ACMI, where art and film come to life through stunning exhibitions and interactive experiences. Stroll along the Yarra River for picturesque views, or immerse yourself in the bustling energy of Swanston Street with its mix of shopping and dining.

Indulge in Melbourne's diverse culinary scene, from authentic Thai street food at Soi 38 to Japanese artisanal treats at Bakemono Bakery. Satisfy your sweet tooth with Filipino-inspired desserts at Karriton Dessert or enjoy a leisurely brunch at Higher Grounds.

Beyond the city, discover the breathtaking Great Ocean Road and the coastal charm of Mornington, making Melbourne the perfect destination for culture lovers and adventure seekers alike.

recommendations.title: Yarra River Walk
